verbose_text: Our finding that the TRPA1 antagonist HC-030031 is as effective as the COX inhibitor ibuprofen to inhibit the development of carrageenan and AITC induced edema is promising, and may help to develop safer anti-inflammatory drugs than existing COX inhibitors.
evidence: TRPA1 antagonist HC-030031 is as effective as the COX inhibitor ibuprofen to inhibit the development of carrageenan and AITC
